channel.title: Planning on Project notebook for the Invasion Heterogeneity project
channel.description: Recent content in Planning on Project notebook for the Invasion Heterogeneity project

item.title: Feedback from Jenn on June notebook
item.description: Jenn has sent a couple of emails in response to last spring’s work: September 29 Here’s some feedback on thhe Key Results (from June). More on Monday! Silique number does not seem to be a good proxy for the number of seeds actually released (e.g., p. 153) I’m not sure where to go with this. Seems like there could be several explanations - either the siliques opened with a lot of variability, there’s more variation in seeds/silique than we estimated, or some seeds are much more viable than others.
